Package com.comp2042.Logic.bricks

package com.comp2042.Logic.bricks
Defines the entities and generation logic for Tetris bricks (tetrominoes). Contains the `Brick` interface and concrete implementations for all standard shapes (I, J, L, O, S, T, Z) as well as special bricks like the Bomb brick. Also includes generators for producing sequences of bricks.
Author:
Abdullah Usmani
